text: Allah ki taraf baar baar palatne waley, uski bandagi baja laney walyy, uski tareef ke gun gaane waley , uski khatir zameen mein gardish karne waley, uske aagey ruku aur sajde karne waley, neki ka hukum dene waley, badi se roakne waley, aur Allah ke hudood ki hifazat karne waley, (is shaan ke hote hain woh momin jo Allah se khareed o farokht ka yeh maamla tai karte hain) aur (aey Nabi), in momino ko khush khabri de do
